edge_det_weight.description: weight of classifiers in edge detection
edge_det_weight.additional_notes: The vertical/horizontal detection becomes more aggressive as edge_det_weight increases. When edge_det_weight = 0, no horizontal/vertical detection is detected. When edge_det_weight = 0.99, tend to detect either horizontal or vertical direction.

edge_det_noise_offset.additional_notes: The vertical/horizontal edge detection becomes more aggressive as edge_det_noise_offset ak decreases.

dis_directional_g.additional_notes: 0: enable directional interpolation (default). 1: disable directional interpolation

dis_directional_rb.additional_notes: 0: enable directional interpolation (default). 1: disable directional interpolation

lambda_g.description: low-frequency component weighting in G interpolation
lambda_g.additional_notes: The larger lambda_g, the more blurry the Demosaic output

lambda_rb.description: low-frequency component weighting in RB interpolation
lambda_rb.additional_notes: The larger lambda_rb, the more blurry the Demosaic output

en_dyna_clamp_g.description: enable dynamic clamping in G interpolation
en_dyna_clamp_g.additional_notes: 0: enable dynamic clamping. 1: disable dynamic clamping.

en_dyna_clamp_rb.description: enable dynamic clamping in RB interpolation
en_dyna_clamp_rb.additional_notes: 0: enable dynamic clamping. 1: disable dynamic clamping.
